question: The theme of 2018 World Asthma Day is ____________.
option4: Never too early, never too late
answer: Never too early, never too late
explanation: World Asthma Day is celebrated worldwide on the first Tuesday of May every year. It is organised by the Global Initiative for Asthma (GINA), it is a global health event aimed at improving asthma awareness and care worldwide. The theme of this year's event is 'Never too early, never too late'. Asthma is a chronic lung disease that is caused by inflammation of the airways.
